answers.author: Pamela Muse
answers.text:
Rebecca – hope the following is helpful:
Temporary Public Art Displays Policy
http://www.parkridge.us/assets/1/Documents/CPS46.pdf
Gig Harbor - Art Display Policies
http://cityofgigharbor.net/page.php?id=1197 
Columbia County, GA - Policy for Public Art Exhibits
http://www.columbiacountyga.gov/index.aspx?page=4048 
Kirkland, WA – Public Art Policy Guidelines
http://www.mrsc.org/policyprocedures/k53public_art_policy.pdf 
Waukesha, WI - Guidelines for Rotating Public Art Displays
http://www.ci.waukesha.wi.us/c/document_library/get_file?uuid=dfc81f62-4d48-4bd6-9cc3-425b5bdaa349&groupId=10113 
Pam
Pamela Muse
Western Regional Director
888-468-6450 Voice
480-231-3538 Text
pmuse@transformgov.org
www.transformgov.org

author: Rebecca Collier
text: I am looking for sample policies regarding public art displays.  Can anyone point me in the right direction?  Thank you.
title: Policy on Public Art Display
